### circuitikz manual tutorial ch2

Code for 2.1


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
```{tikz, engine.opts=list(extra.preamble=c("\\usepackage{xcolor}", "\\usepackage{circuitikz}")), cache=TRUE, fig.ext="png"}
\begin{circuitikz}[american] 
  \draw (0,0) to[isource, l=$I_0$, v=$V_0$](0,3) 
        to[short, -*, i=$I_0$](2,3)
        to[R=$R_1$, i>_=$i_1$](2,0) -- (0,0);
  \draw (2,3) --(4,3) to[R=$R_2$, i>_=$i_2$](4,0) 
        to[short, -*](2,0);
  \draw[red, thick] (0.6,2.1) rectangle (4.2,3.8)
    node[pos=0.5, above]{KCL};
\end{circuitikz}
```
### Code for 2.2

```{tikz, engine.opts=list(extra.preamble=c("\\usepackage{xcolor}", "\\usepackage{circuitikz}"))}

\begin{circuitikz}[american, voltage shift=0.5, scale=3] 
    \draw (0,0) node[above]{$v_i$} to [short, o-] ++(1,0)
    node[op amp, noinv input up, anchor=+](OA){\texttt{OA1}}
    (OA.-) -- ++(0,-1) coordinate(FB)
    ;
\end{circuitikz}
```

### code for 2.3

```{tikz, engine.opts=list(extra.preamble=c("\\usepackage{xcolor}", "\\usepackage{circuitikz}"))}

\begin{circuitikz}[american, voltage shift=0.5, scale=3] 
    \draw 
        (0,0) node[dinantenna] (ant) {} to[amp, l=LNA] ++(3, 0)
        to[bandpass, l=BPF, >] ++(1,0)
        to[short] ++(1,0) node[mixer, anchor=west] (mix) {Mixer}
        (mix.e) to[short, -o] ++(1, 0)
        (mix.w) node[inputarrow] {}
        (mix.s) node[inputarrow, rotate=90]{} -- ++(0,-0.5) node[oscillator, anchor=north, label={[anchor=north]below:LO}] {};

        \node[waves, scale=0.5, xshift=-2cm] at (0, 0.75) {};
\end{circuitikz}
